title: The first time we met in the socialise vc
description: you instantly asked me if i was a minor

title: Finding out we both like Jujutsu Kaisen and Gojo
description: i remember our first time talking about it how we instantly got so excited especially cause you already had GOJO AS PFP

title: Saying I love yous even if it started playfully
description: i remember how you would do your 'sigh ily' to me and get mad when i didnt say it back in 0.0001 seconds

title: Giving each other pet names like dad and kitty
description: god how can i forgot im pretty sure this happened like 6 months later but i wanted to put it here

title: Planning to get matching profile pictures
description: i remember it was i think either the same week or next when we instantly matched

title: Making plans to watch a show together
description: this happened later too but im putting it down as i remember so i can organize it later

title: Sharing personal preferences and insecurities
description: i remember the first time you told me about your insecurities and how you were scared to tell me cause you thought i would judge you

title: Planning an act of kindness to show my love
description: i remember ohw you would get so happy and cry whenever i did something nice for you especially our dates and anniversary

title: Discovering our shared interest in Bungo Stray Dogs
description: OR THE TIME WE WATCHED BSD NIGGA ISTG

title: Laughing together at random things online
description: one of my favorite memories is whenever someone would randomly come out of nowhere and i would say 'Who the fuck is this' and you would always laugh

title: Dreaming about our future together
description: remember when we would always talk about our future and how we would be together and how we would have like 6 cats and how we would get married and how we would live together

title: Comforting each other during tough family situations
description: i remember all the tough times we went through together and how we would always be there for each other especially with your dad and my mom

title: Watching The Notebook together
description: NIGGA U CAN NOT TELL ME THAT GUY FROM NOTEBOOK IS NOT ME I HAVE LITERALLY FORCED U TO DATE ME

title: Giving each other compliments
description: even tho you say its 'glazing' i will always say 'you're so pretty' cause i love you and you're my girlfriend and i want you to know that you're beautiful and i love you

title: Making plans for future dates
description: i remember when we would plan our dates and how we would always be so excited for them and how we would always be so happy when we would go on them

title: Me planning an act of kindness to show my love
description: like those casual little things id do from a sweet message to poem to notes to drawings to gifts and you would always be so happy and appreciate it

title: Reading you bedtime stories
description: NIGGA ARGHHH I REMEMBER HOW IT WAS LIKE 3 AM AND I WAS READING YOU BEDTIME STORIES AND YOU WOULD BE SO SLEEPY AND YOU ALWAYS FELL ASLEEP (sometimes not) AND ID BE LIKE 'DID U FALL ASLEEP' AND U WOULD BE LIKE '....' (get it cause youre asleep)

title: Sharing personal moments
description: this isnt really a memory but i just wanted to put it here cause i love you

title: Watching a movie and discussing our reactions
description: HOW EVERYTIME SOMETHIGN HAPPENS IN A MOVIE WE WATCH WE BOTH GO IN CHAT AND INSTANTLY LIKE YELL AT EACH OTHER WHATS HAPPENING

title: Sharing jokes
description: do i HAVE to explain this one obviously we both know who is the funnier one here (me)
